name: Lofi Vibe Simulator
description:
The soft, sweet, and melancholic vibes of a lofi radio station

~

Staring out the window on a Saturday with nothing to do

~

A quiet moment with a fresh cup of coffee

~

Sometimes you need a break. Sometimes you want to be in a quiet space one thin wall away from a busy city. Take a deep breath and relax into the soft lofi vibes for a few minutes.

A lot of free songs from freemusicarchive.org and sfx from freesounds.org were used in this game. All details + licensing information can be found in the credits.yml file below (which is also in the source code).
